rows.label: tlk41300072_03_msg0001
rows.name:
We refugees don't get
any proper information.

rows.label: tlk41300072_03_msg0002
rows.name:
In the end, is the war between
Superbia and Invidia going
to end? Or continue?

rows.label: tlk41300072_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I don't know anything, but there's
one thing I can say for sure.

rows.label: tlk41300072_03_msg0004
rows.name:
As long as Acedia manages
the Blades, conflicts like
this will never disappear.
